name: Euro 2016 Manager Pro
description:
Be the manager of your favorite soccer team and win the EURO Championship 2016!

The final results of the EURO 2016 depends on you.

**********
This Pro version includes an editor for player names and contains no advertising.
**********

Choose one of the 24 national teams and take over the role of the team manager!

Make all the important decisions to lead your team to the top at the EURO Championship 2016 in France: choose the right tactics, optimize your line up and take care of your players!

An exciting live ticker with animated scenes and an atmospheric sound guarantees countless thrilling matches.

Features
**********
- all groups, stadiums and schedules of EURO 2016 in France
- coach rating and a public highscore
- private highscore list with up to 10 friends
- direct matches with your friends in battle mode
- animated highlights recorded for every match
- many, many statistics
- English and German language
- this Pro version includes an editor for player names and contains no advertising

The team at FeliGames wishes a lot of fun!
